name: Geralf's Messenger
text:
Geralf's Messenger enters the battlefield tapped.
When Geralf's Messenger enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life.
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Geralf's Mindcrusher
text:
When Geralf's Mindcrusher enters the battlefield, target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)

name: Gerrard
text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.

editions.flavor: Soldier. Adventurer. Heir to the Legacy. Gerrard has, over the years, traveled much of Dominaria in search of fortune and glory. Now, after serving nobly in the Benalish army, he has returned to the Weatherlight to serve as captain in Sisay's absence and to take up the battle against the Lord of the Wastes.

name: Gerrard Capashen
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition

name: Gerrard's Battle Cry
text: {2}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"
Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"
Gerrard grinned and drew his sword. "This won't be a fair fight," he called to his crew. "They should have brought a second ship!"

name: Gerrard's Command
text: Untap target creature. It gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: "Unless you like the idea of becoming some goblin's lunch, get up and move!"

editions.set: Duel Decks: Phyrexia vs. the Coalition
editions.flavor: "Unless you like the idea of becoming some goblin's lunch, get up and move!"

name: Gerrard's Irregulars
text: Trample, haste

editions.flavor: Had Gerrard realized he'd end up fighting against them, he might not have trained them so well.

name: Gerrard's Verdict
text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

editions.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.
A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.

name: Gerrard's Wisdom
text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

editions.flavor: "You'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."
A picture is worth a thousand swords.

"Fighting without an army is called a duel, and you'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war."
—Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Gerrymandering
text: Remove all lands from play and shuffle them together. Randomly deal to each player one land card for each land he or she had before. Each player puts those lands into play under his or her control, untapped.

name: Get a Life
text: Target player and each of his or her teammates exchange life totals.

editions.flavor: Gimme five! (Or whatever you got.)

name: Geth, Lord of the Vault
text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
{X}{B}: Put target artifact or creature card with converted mana cost X from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped. Then that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

name: Geth's Grimoire
text: Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may draw a card.

editions.flavor: The book shrieks horribly until its cover is opened, granting the spirit inside a moment's rest from the painful stirrings of the book's contents.

name: Geth's Verdict
text: Target player sacrifices a creature and loses 1 life.

editions.flavor:
"Everyone should owe you something."
—Geth, Lord of the Vault

name: Geyserfield Stalker
text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyserfield Stalker gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Geyser Glider
text: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

editions.flavor:
"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

"Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air."
—Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

name: Ghalma's Warden
text: Metalcraft — Ghalma's Warden gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more artifacts.

editions.flavor: A special unit guards the loxodon artificer known as Ghalma the Shaper. They are armed and armored in her finest works of silver and steel.

name: Ghastlord of Fugue
text:
Ghastlord of Fugue can't be blocked.
Whenever Ghastlord of Fugue deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player exiles that card.

editions.flavor:
"He is a ghost that has never known life."
—The Seer's Parables

name: Ghastly Conscription
text: Exile all creature cards from target player's graveyard in a face-down pile, shuffle that pile, then manifest those cards. (To manifest a card, put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)

name: Ghastly Demise
text: Destroy target nonblack creature if its toughness is less than or equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.

editions.flavor:
"Anyone can snap her fingers and yank a soul. I prefer to kill creatively."
—Braids, dementia summoner

name: Ghastly Discovery
text:
Draw two cards, then discard a card.
Conspire (As you cast this spell, you may tap two untapped creatures you control that share a color with it. When you do, copy it.)

editions.flavor: Korrigans, spirits bound to sources of water, shriek when they come upon their own drowned corpses.

name: Ghastly Haunting
text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

editions.flavor: The body often twists and flails spasmodically as the spirit explores its new home.

name: Ghastly Remains
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ghastly Remains is in your graveyard, you may pay {B}{B}{B}. If you do, return Ghastly Remains to your hand.

name: Ghave, Guru of Spores
text:
Ghave, Guru of Spores enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Ghazbán Ogre
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Ghazbán Ogre.

editions.flavor:
"We were holding our own—until the ogre guiding us suddenly grinned and turned on our commander."
—Ivra Jursdotter, Sarpadian mercenary

name: Ghazbán Ogress
text: When Ghazbán Ogress comes into play, the player who has won the most Magic games that day gains control of it. If more than one player has won the same number of games, you retain control of Ghazbán Ogress.

name: Ghirapur Aether Grid
text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Ghirapur Aether Grid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

name: Ghirapur Æther Grid
text: Tap two untapped artifacts you control: Ghirapur Æther Grid deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: The city of Ghirapur is a living thing, and living things defend themselves.

name: Ghirapur Gearcrafter
text: When Ghirapur Gearcrafter enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. (A creature with flying can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

editions.flavor: The metal must be pure. The hand must be steady. The product must be perfect.

name: Ghirapur Guide
text: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

editions.flavor: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

name: Ghirapur Orrery
text:
Each player may play an additional land on each of his or her turns.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, that player draws three cards.

editions.flavor: This detailed model allows the edificers to examine the city from every angle.

name: Ghirapur Osprey
text: Flying

editions.flavor: Many airship captains keep pets that share their love of the sky.

{1}{R}: Ghitu Encampment becomes a 2/1 red Warrior creature with first strike until end of turn. It's still a land. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)

text: {T}, Sacrifice Ghitu Fire-Eater: Ghitu Fire-Eater deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.

When Ghitu Slinger enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

editions.flavor: If you survive a slinger attack, the slinger wished you to live.

name: Ghitu War Cry
text: {R}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The war cry is not simply a shout but a sacrament.

text:
First strike

Trample

editions.flavor:
"Ma said we should offer up blini-cakes and salt to the good ones, but I get that chill up my spine and just shut the door."
—Otak, Tin Street shopkeep

name: Ghost Tactician
text: {W}, {T}, Discard a card: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

editions.flavor: Its ethereal hand confers a lifetime of experience with combat and steel.

name: Ghost Town
text:
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{0}: Return Ghost Town to its owner's hand. Activate this ability only if it's not your turn.

editions.flavor:
"The air here smells like a grave."
—Crovax

name: Ghost Warden
text: {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

"I thought of fate as an iron lattice, intricate but rigidly unchangeable. That was until some force bent fate's bars to spare my life."
—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

—Ilromov, traveling storyteller

name: Ghostway
text: Exile each creature you control. Return those cards to the battlefield under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

editions.flavor:
"I watched its blade swing through me, but I was hollow, empty. I saw its face contort in rage but could not hear it snarl."
—Klattic, Boros legionnaire

name: Ghoulcaller Gisa
text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

editions.flavor: "Geralf, must you always whine? I agreed to nothing. I'll raise ghouls anytime I wish."

name: Ghoulcaller's Accomplice
text: {3}{B}, Exile Ghoulcaller's Accomplice from your graveyard: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

editions.flavor: "Once in the box, we're all the same."

name: Ghoulcaller's Bell
text: {T}: Each player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

editions.flavor: The bell's chime heralds the rise of the unhallowed from the grave and the fall of their victims into the earth.

name: Ghoulcaller's Chant
text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return two target Zombie cards from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor:
"The living are born small and weak. The dead rise ready to serve. The choice is obvious."
—Gisa, ghoulcaller of Gavony

name: Ghoulflesh
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

editions.flavor: The body dies in stages. First the skin, then the muscle. The brain is last, much to the victim's dismay.

name: Ghoulraiser
text: When Ghoulraiser enters the battlefield, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

editions.flavor:
"Come. Bring your brothers. Tonight, you feast on living flesh."

text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

name: Ghoulsteed
text: {2}{B}, Discard two cards: Return Ghoulsteed from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

editions.flavor: It once served a cathar roadwatcher, patrolling the crossways between villages. Its hooves still carry it along the same path.

name: Ghoultree
text: Ghoultree costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

editions.flavor: It uproots entire fengrafs to add to its twisted frame.

text:
Trample

Flying

text:
Haste

editions.flavor: It waits with absolute stillness. One might think it a statue if it weren't occasionally seen chewing on its victims.

At the sight of the thing the calamari vendor's eyes went wide, but from fear or avarice none could tell.

name: Giant Oyster
text:
You may choose not to untap Giant Oyster during your untap step.
{T}: For as long as Giant Oyster remains tapped, target tapped creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step, and at the beginning of each of your draw steps, put a -1/-1 counter on that creature. When Giant Oyster leaves the battlefield or becomes untapped, remove all -1/-1 counters from the creature.

name: Giant Scorpion
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

editions.flavor: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

editions.set: Duel Decks: Nissa vs. Ob Nixilis
editions.flavor: Its sting hurts, but death is strangely painless.

name: Giant Shark
text:
Giant Shark can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
Whenever Giant Shark blocks or becomes blocked by a creature that has been dealt damage this turn, Giant Shark gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Giant Shark.

name: Giant's Ire
text: Giant's Ire deals 4 damage to target player. If you control a Giant, draw a card.

editions.flavor: The only feeling greater than hurling something a mile is crushing something else with it that was really, really irritating you.

name: Giant Slug
text: {5}: At the beginning of your next upkeep, choose a basic land type. Giant Slug gains landwalk of the chosen type until the end of that turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of that type.)

name: Giant Solifuge
text:
